translated: Thus, the one who sees is totally pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is totally pure—they are not two, nor are they divided.

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pas / gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, form is totally pure because of the purity of attachment.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas /
translated: Form is totally pure because of the purity of form.

original: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Attachment is totally pure because of the purity of attachment.🔽Thus, the purity of attachment and the purity of form are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is totally pure because of the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Attachment is totally pure because of the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do; ;zhe sdang rnam par dag pas /🔽gzugs rnam par dag pa /🔽gzugs rnam par dag pas /

translated: “The purity of anger is the purity of the perfection of morality, the purity of patience, the purity of perseverance, the purity of concentration, and the purity of wisdom.

original: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of wisdom is the purity of anger.🔽Thus, the purity of anger and the purity of wisdom are not two and are not divided.🔽“The purity of anger is the purity of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.🔽The purity of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening is the purity of anger.🔽Thus, the purity of anger and the purity of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not two and are not divided.

original: de ltar na zhe sdang rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag @236b pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad de //
analyzed: de ltar na zhe sdang rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag @236b pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad de //
translated: “The purity of anger is the purity of the ten powers of a tathāgata, the purity of the four fearlessnesses, the purity of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the purity of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and the purity of great compassion.

original: zhe sdang rnam par dag pas /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam par dag pas / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of great compassion is the purity of anger.🔽Thus, the purity of anger and the purity of great compassion are not two and are not divided.🔽“The purity of anger is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of anger.🔽Thus, the purity of anger and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.🔽“The purity of anger is the purity of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of path aspects is the purity of anger.🔽Thus, the purity of anger and the purity of the knowledge of path aspects are not two and are not divided.

analyzed: gti mug rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of delusion.🔽Thus, the purification of delusion and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

analyzed: 'dod chags yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na 'dod chags yongs su dag pa dang / gzugs yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: 'dod chags yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: rga shi rnam par dag pas /
translated: Since aging and death are pure,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: Since the perfection of wisdom is pure,

original: rga shi rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rga shi rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: aging and death are pure.

original: de ltar na rga shi rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na rga shi rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of old age and death and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are not two and are not divided, and so on up to:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the perfection of wisdom🔽is the purification of the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the perfection of concentration🔽is the purification of the perfection of perseverance.

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the perfection of perseverance🔽is the purification of the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the perfection of patience🔽is the purification of the perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽Thus, there is no duality here, there is no division, there is no differentiation, there is no discrimination.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving

analyzed: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag @238b pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽Thus, there is no duality here, there is no division, there is no differentiation, there is no discrimination.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving🔽is the purity of inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of inner emptiness

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: is the purity of the perfection of giving.

original: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, there is no duality here, there is no division, there is no differentiation, there is no discrimination.🔽The purity of inner emptiness

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: is the purity of outer emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of external and internal🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of essence,🔽and the purity of the emptiness of essence🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the ultimate,

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of the ultimate🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽and the purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the unlimited,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of the unlimited🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of non-discernment,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of non-discernment🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of essence,🔽and the purity of the emptiness of essence🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of all phenomena🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of specific characteristics,🔽and the purity of the emptiness of specific characteristics🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the non-existence of specific characteristics,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of the non-existence of specific characteristics🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the great emptiness,🔽and the purity of the great emptiness🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the ultimate,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of the ultimate🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽and the purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena

original: de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: and the purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena🔽are non-dual and not discriminated.🔽The

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @239a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid @239a *//
translated: The purity of the emptiness of essential nature that is not a non-thing.

original: rnam par dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, there is no duality in the purity of the emptiness of essential nature that is not a non-thing and the purity of the applications of mindfulness. They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas / yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the applications of mindfulness.🔽The purity of the right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the right efforts.🔽The purity of the bases of supernatural powers.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas /🔽dbang po rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas / dbang po rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the bases of supernatural powers.🔽The purity of the faculties.

original: dbang po rnam par dag pas /🔽stobs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dbang po rnam par dag pas / stobs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the faculties.🔽The purity of the powers.

original: stobs rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: stobs rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the branches of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas /🔽lam rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas / lam rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the branches of awakening🔽is the purity of the path.

original: lam rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: lam rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the path

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: is the purity of the branches of awakening.

original: de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang; lam rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang; lam rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the branches of awakening and the purity of the path are not two, nor are they divided.

original: lam rnam par dag pas /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: lam rnam par dag pas / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the path🔽is the purity of the noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas /🔽bsam gtan rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa /

original: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas /🔽tshad med pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas / tshad med pa rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa /

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad @239b rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad @239b rnam par dag pas /

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas /

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purification of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag la; mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purification of the superknowledges,🔽the purification of the meditative stabilities,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas / gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purification of the meditative stabilities,🔽the purification of the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa /

original: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: the purification of fearlessness,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa /

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the distinct qualities of the Buddha are pure.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas /🔽thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas / thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

original: thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: Since the knowledge of all things is pure,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: the knowledge of the aspects of the path is pure.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: Since the knowledge of the aspects of the path is pure,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: Since the knowledge of all aspects is pure,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of the aspects of the path is pure.

original: @240a *// de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: @240a *// de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of the aspects of the path and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two. They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and are not different.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure,

original: gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: form is pure,

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas /
translated: form being pure,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom being pure, form being pure, and the knowledge of all aspects being pure, these are not two, are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not come apart.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The perfection of wisdom being pure,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: Consciousness being pure,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of the perfection of wisdom, the purification of consciousness, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / mig rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the perfection of wisdom🔽is the purification of the eye.

original: mig rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purification of the eye

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @240b nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of the perfection of wisdom, the purification of the eye, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purification of the perfection of wisdom🔽is the purification of the ear.

analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par dag pa; yid rnam par dag pas /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas / gzugs rnam par dag pa /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas /

translated: The purification of the emptiness of great extent is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the unlimited is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of non-dispersal is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of inherent existence is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The purification of the emptiness of all phenomena is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

translated: The purification of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The

translated: The purity of the right efforts is the purity of the legs of miraculous power.🔽The purity of the legs of miraculous power is the purity of the five faculties.🔽The purity of the five faculties is the purity of the five powers.🔽The purity of the five powers is the purity of the seven aspects of enlightenment.🔽The purity of the seven aspects of enlightenment is the purity of the noble eightfold path.🔽The purity of the noble eightfold path is the purity of the ten wholesome actions.🔽The purity of the ten wholesome actions is the purity of the four concentrations.🔽The purity of the four concentrations is the purity of the four immeasurables.🔽The purity of the four immeasurables is the purity of the four formless absorptions.

translated: Thus, the purity of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature and the purity of the tactile perception that arises from the condition of contact with mental phenomena and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible, not two, not divided, and not broken apart.

translated: “In that case, the purification of the noble eightfold path and the purification of the sensory element of the mental faculty, the purification of the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the purification of the sense field of mental phenomena are indivisible, not separable, not cut apart, and not multiple.🔽“The purification of the applications of mindfulness and the purification of the right efforts, the purification of the legs of miraculous power, the purification of the faculties, the purification of the powers, the purification of the branches of enlightenment, and the purification of the noble eightfold path are indivisible, not separable, not cut apart, and not multiple.

translated: “The purification of the ten powers of the tathāgatas and the purification of the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are indivisible, not separable, not cut apart, and not multiple.

translated: and the purification of form is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of form and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible, they are not differentiated, and they cannot be made two.🔽The purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purification of sensation,🔽and the purification of sensation is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of sensation and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible, they are not differentiated, and they cannot be made two.🔽The purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purification of perception,🔽and the purification of perception is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of perception and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible, they are not differentiated, and they cannot be made two.🔽The purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purification of formation,🔽and the purification of formation is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of formation and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible, they are not differentiated, and they cannot be made two.🔽The purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purification of consciousness,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the purification of consciousness is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of consciousness and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible, they are not differentiated, and they cannot be made two.🔽The purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purification of the eye sense sphere,🔽and the purification of the eye sense sphere is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the eye sense sphere and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible, they are not differentiated, and they cannot be made two.🔽The purification of the knowledge of all aspects

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: is the purification of the ear sense sphere,🔽and the purification of the ear sense

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are pure.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: Consciousness being pure,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects, the purity of consciousness, and the purity of the perfection of wisdom are not two and are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not become different.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purity of the condition of contact up to the condition of mental contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis @248b tshor ba rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis @248b tshor ba rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purity of the condition of mental contact

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the resultant feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact through mental faculty are not two and are not divided.

original: rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /🔽gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas / gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purification of form.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purification of form

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: is the purification of the perfection of meditative stabilization, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of generosity.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar mang so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar mang so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of form, and the purification of the perfection of giving are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, they are not different.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas /
translated: The purification of the knowledge of all aspects

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du rnam par dag pa /
translated: is the purification of the sensory element of the eyes,🔽the purification of the sensory element of the eyes is the purification of the sensory element of sights,🔽the purification of the sensory element of sights is the purification of the sensory element of visual consciousness,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas /
translated: the purification of the sensory element of visual consciousness is the purification of the perfection of meditative concentration,🔽the purification of the perfection of meditative concentration is the purification of the perfection of perseverance,🔽the purification of the perfection of perseverance is the purification of the perfection of patience,🔽the purification of the perfection of patience is the purification of the perfection of morality,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang; bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang; bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the purification of the perfection of morality is the purification of the perfection of giving.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag @249a *//
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag @249a *//
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽is the purification of the perfection of giving.

original: pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rab 'byor / gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pas /
translated: the purification of the sensory domain of mental phenomena, the purification of the sensory activity field of the mental faculty, the purification of sensory contact that is mentally compounded, the purification of sensation that arises from sensory contact that is mentally compounded, and the purification of the perfection of generosity.

original: 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, furthermore, the uncompounded is purified by the purification of the compounded.

original: de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rab 'byor / gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: Thus, the purification of the compounded and the purification of the uncompounded are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, furthermore, the future and the present are purified by the purification of the past.

original: de ltar na 'das pa rnam par dag pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'das pa rnam par dag pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purification of the past, the purification of the future, and the purification of the present are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.

original: ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas /
translated: Since the future is pure,🔽

original: 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the future is the purity of the past and the present.

original: de ltar na ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: de ltar na ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas /
translated: Thus, the purity of the future and the purity of the past and the present are non-dual and indivisible.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the present is the purity of the past and the future.

original: de ltar na da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: Thus, the purity of the present and the purity of the past and the future are non-dual and indivisible.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: the appearance of purity is pure.

original: ma rig pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma rig pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because ignorance is pure,

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: the appearance of purity is pure.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang; reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rnam par dag pa'i phyir /🔽rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /

translated: consciousness, name and form, the six sense spheres, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and aging and death are pure.

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha @252a *//🔽rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha @252a *// rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: “The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: “The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving.

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: “The appearance of purity is due to the purity of inner emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'i phyir /🔽rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'i phyir / rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is pure.

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the applications of mindfulness.

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the right efforts, the legs of discipline, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the eightfold path.

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of purity is due to the purity of the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness,

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: and the purification of the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang; byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'i phyir /🔽rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang; byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'i phyir / rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of paths, the knowledge of all aspects,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi @252b rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi @252b rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa snang ba'o //
translated: Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who possess those attributes, indications, and signs are revealed to be irreversible.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should contemplate the following: ‘The transcendent perfection of wisdom is not a transcendent perfection because it is not a transcendent perfection.

original: rnam par dag pa ni nying gi mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni nying gi mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Purity is the absence of the connection of the middle.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because of complete purity.”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: gang la nying gi mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: gang la nying gi mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: in what is the absence of the connection of the middle pure?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: “The non-transference and non-connection of form is pure.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The non-transference and non-connection of feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness is pure.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med cing nying gi mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The non-transference and non-connection of , up to and including the knowledge of all aspects, is pure.”🔽Śāriputra said:

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: in what is the absence of the connection of the middle pure?”

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'o //
translated: “It is uncontaminated.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Blessed One said, “Because it is utterly pure.”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra then asked,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽in what way is the absence of contamination pure

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: because of the absence of contamination?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: gzugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du @253a *//
analyzed: gzugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o // tshor ba dang / 'du @253a *//
translated: “Because form is naturally radiant, it is pure and uncontaminated.

original: shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
translated: Because feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are naturally radiant, they are pure and uncontaminated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the knowledge of all aspects is naturally radiant,🔽it is pure and uncontaminated.”

original: rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
translated: “Blessed One,🔽how is form naturally radiant?”🔽“Śāriputra, form is empty by nature.🔽Because it is empty by nature, it is naturally radiant.🔽Because it is naturally radiant, it is pure and uncontaminated.🔽Because it is pure and uncontaminated, it is said to be naturally radiant.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because of utter purity.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' @258a *//
analyzed: ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' @258a *//
translated: “Blessed One, why is the infinity of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness due to the infinity of the self?”

original: yas pas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: yas pas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: “Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of form?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”🔽“Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of the eyes?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”🔽“Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind?”🔽The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu mtha' yas pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu mtha' yas pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of the perfection of giving?”🔽The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”🔽“Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom?”

original: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”🔽“Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of inner emptiness?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ci'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ci'i slad du /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”

original: bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas /
analyzed: bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas /
translated: “Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of no beginning or end, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of its own mark, the emptiness of all things, or the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence?”🔽The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags /
translated: “Lord, is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness infinite because of the infinity of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence?”🔽The Blessed One replied, “No, Subhūti, it is not.”

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas /

translated: If they perceive the sense spheres, the constituents, and the dependent originations as empty, they are attached.

translated: If they perceive the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom as empty, they are attached.

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //

original: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
