analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: “If they perceive the powers, fearlessnesses, detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as empty, they are attached.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: “If they perceive up to the knowledge of all aspects as empty, they are attached.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: Moreover, if sons or daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, through lack of skill in means, perceive past dharmas as past dharmas, they are attached.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams @260b la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams @260b la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive future dharmas as future dharmas, they are attached.

original: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o //
translated: If they perceive present dharmas as present dharmas, they are attached.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽Moreover, if sons or daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa'i tshul du /🔽sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba nas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa'i tshul du / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba nas /
translated: in a manner of objectification,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: if they practice the perfection of giving, starting from the first production of the thought of awakening, they are attached.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o // nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: When they practice the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom, they are attached.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: When they practice inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, they are attached.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: When they practice the applications of mindfulness, they are attached.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: When they practice the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path, they are attached.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: When they practice the noble truths, they are attached.

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o //🔽rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags @261a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o // rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags @261a *//
translated: If one practices the meditative absorptions, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless meditative stabilizations, one is attached.🔽If one practices the liberations, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and the superknowledges, one is attached.🔽

original: pa'o; ;ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o; ;ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, they are attached.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o //
translated: If they practice up to the knowledge of all aspects, they are attached.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
translated: “Moreover, what is the nonattachment of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings skilled in means

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs la gzugs zhes bya ba 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs la gzugs zhes bya ba 'du shes pa med do //
translated: do not have the notion of ‘form’ with regard to form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion of ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional factors,’ or ‘consciousness’ with regard to consciousness.🔽They do not have the notion of ‘past phenomena’ with regard to past phenomena.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: They do not have the notion of ‘future phenomena’ with regard to future phenomena.

original: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
translated: He does not conceive of present dharmas as present dharmas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /🔽'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni / 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no //
translated: a bodhisattva great being who is skilled in means and practices the perfection of wisdom🔽does not think, ‘I will give a gift

original: 'di la sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin zhe'am /
analyzed: 'di la sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin zhe'am /
translated: to this one, or I will give such and such a gift.’

original: bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig @261b bsrung ngo //
analyzed: bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig @261b bsrung ngo //
translated: ‘I will guard morality.

original: tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe'am /
translated: I will guard such and such morality.’

original: bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo //
analyzed: bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo //
translated: ‘I will cultivate patience.

original: bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
analyzed: bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
translated: I will cultivate such and such patience.’

original: bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsam mo //
analyzed: bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsam mo //
translated: ‘I will make an effort.

original: brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe'am /
analyzed: brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe'am /
translated: I will make such and such an effort.’

original: bdag gis ni bsam gtan zhig la mnyam par gzhag go /
analyzed: bdag gis ni bsam gtan zhig la mnyam par gzhag go /
translated: ‘I will rest in concentration.

original: bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zhe'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zhe'am /
translated: I will rest in such and such concentration.’

original: bdag gis ni shes rab cig bsgom mo //
analyzed: bdag gis ni shes rab cig bsgom mo //
translated: I am cultivating wisdom.

original: shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
analyzed: shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am /
translated: I am cultivating this kind of wisdom.

original: bdag gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do //🔽bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do //
analyzed: bdag gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do // bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do //
translated: I am producing merit.🔽I am producing this kind of merit.

original: bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do zhe'am /
analyzed: bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do zhe'am /
translated: I am producing this much merit.

original: bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: I am entering into the faultlessness of a bodhisattva.

original: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: I am purifying a buddhafield.

original: bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: I am bringing beings to maturity.

original: bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de /
analyzed: bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de /
translated: I am attaining the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom with skillful means

original: rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: All such conceptual thoughts, and inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa @262a *//
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa @262a *//
translated: emptiness of compounded phenomena, emptiness of uncompounded phenomena, emptiness of beyond extremes, emptiness of no beginning or end,

original: stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: emptiness of nonrepudiation, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, emptiness of nonapprehension, emptiness of nonexistence,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste /
translated: and emptiness of essential nature and emptiness of nonexistence of essential nature are all nonexistent and nonoccurring.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa /
analyzed: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa /
translated: these are the skillful means of bodhisattva great beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med pa dag go /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med pa dag go /
translated: They are the non-attachment of those who practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to the venerable Su­bhūti:

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti,

original: rnam grangs gang gis na; byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rnam grangs gang gis na; byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: by what method do the sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas become attached?”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The venerable Su­bhūti replied to Śakra, Lord of the Gods, as follows:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika!

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
translated: who have the idea of the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience,🔽the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, the idea of inner emptiness, the idea of outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid du @262b 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'du shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid du @262b 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'du shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /
translated: the idea of inner and outer emptiness, up to the idea of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, the idea of the applications of mindfulness, the idea of the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
translated: the bases of supernatural powers, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the noble eightfold path;🔽the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the liberations, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness; the superknowledges; the meditative stabilizations;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'du shes par gyur te /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'du shes par gyur te /
translated: They are the notion of the lord buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba dag tu 'du shes nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba dag tu 'du shes nas /
translated: and having the notion of the virtues produced in relation to the buddhas,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas /
translated: they gather together those wholesome roots and combine them into one,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
translated: and they dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni /
translated: And they have the notion of that dedication.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste /
translated: those are the attachments of the sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle.

original: chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na /
analyzed: chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na /
translated: Having become attached to those attachments,

original: chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so //
translated: they are not able to practice the perfection of wisdom without attachment.

original: de @263a *// ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de @263a *// ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / koo shi ka /
analyzed: de ni / koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the nature of form cannot be dedicated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness cannot be dedicated.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination cannot be dedicated.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the perfections cannot be dedicated.

original: stong pa nyid thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of all the emptinesses cannot be dedicated.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening cannot be dedicated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so // rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions cannot be dedicated.🔽The nature of the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and the clairvoyances cannot be dedicated.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: The nature of the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha cannot be dedicated.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub @263b kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub @263b kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, and individual enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: Furthermore, Kauśika, bodhisattva great beings🔽should teach others

original: gzhan zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam /🔽yang dag par bskul lam /
analyzed: gzhan zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam / yang dag par bskul lam /
translated: unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽should encourage others,

original: yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam /🔽yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas na /
analyzed: yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas na /
translated: should inspire others,🔽and should delight others.

original: yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: With a mind that has fully engaged, they should teach others,

original: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
translated: they should encourage others,

original: yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o; ;yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o; ;yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: and should be encouraged and delighted.

original: de yang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de yang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, when practicing the perfection of generosity,🔽they should not conceptualize, thinking, ‘I am practicing the perfection of generosity,’

original: bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: ‘I am practicing the perfection of discipline,’🔽‘I am practicing the perfection of patience,’

original: bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: ‘I am practicing the perfection of diligence,’

original: bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: ‘I am practicing the perfection of concentration,’🔽‘I am practicing the perfection of wisdom,’

original: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do //
translated: ‘I am practicing inner emptiness,’

original: bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do //
translated: ‘I am practicing outer emptiness,’

original: bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do //
translated: I am practicing the emptiness of internal phenomena,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of external phenomena,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,

original: bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod do //🔽bdag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la @264a *//
analyzed: bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod do // bdag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la @264a *//
translated: I am practicing the emptiness of emptiness,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of great extent,

original: spyod do // bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do //
analyzed: spyod do // bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do //
translated: I am practicing the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: bdag ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do //
translated: I am practicing the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of non-discarded phenomena,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do //🔽bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do //🔽bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do //
translated: I am practicing the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-apprehension,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-apprehension,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature,🔽I am practicing the emptiness of the existence

original: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya /
analyzed: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya /
translated: “I am practicing the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four unhindered discernments, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,” and “I am practicing the knowledge of all aspects,” and so on up to “I am practicing the knowledge of path aspects,” and so on up to “I am practicing the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya /
analyzed: yang dag par bskul bar bya / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya /
translated: They should be taught,🔽they should be inspired,🔽they should be caused to feel inspired,

original: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste /🔽de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste / de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos /
translated: they should be caused to feel joy.

original: gzhan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: “The sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who practice like that should teach others unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //🔽yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bskul bar bya'o // yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should inspire them.🔽They should cause them to feel inspired.

original: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should cause them to feel joy.

original: de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba @264b bskyed par bya ba des /
analyzed: de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba @264b bskyed par bya ba des /
translated: and also when they are teaching it correctly, exhorting them correctly, arousing their enthusiasm correctly, and gladdening their minds correctly,

original: gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe /
translated: and also when they are teaching it correctly, exhorting them correctly, arousing their enthusiasm correctly, and gladdening their minds correctly,

original: rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: they do not become wounded,

original: sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te /
translated: and they exhort them with an exhortation approved by the Buddha.

original: de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no //🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so //
analyzed: de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so //
translated: In this way, that son of a good family or daughter of a good family avoids all extremes of attachment.”🔽Then the Lord said to the venerable Subhūti, “Excellent, Subhūti!

original: zhes bya ba gnang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gnang ste /
translated: Excellent, Subhūti!”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so //
translated: Subhuti: It is good, O Lord, that the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, have no attachment to form, etc.

original: legs so // rab 'byor /
analyzed: legs so // rab 'byor /
translated: Subhuti, it is good that you have shown the Bodhisattva-mahasattva this kind of attachment.

original: de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba bstan par bya'i /
analyzed: de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba bstan par bya'i /
translated: Subhuti, I will now show you the even more subtle attachments.

original: de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bstan par bya'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bstan par bya'o // bcom ldan 'das / de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to // bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Listen carefully and keep it in mind.

original: rab 'byor / 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa /
translated: The Lord Buddha said, Subhuti, in this regard, a son or daughter of good family who has truly entered into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na /
translated: if they bring to mind the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One as having characteristics,

original: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de tsam du chags pa'o //🔽gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @265a *//🔽bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas /🔽dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing /🔽yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de tsam du chags pa'o // gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @265a *// bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas / dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
translated: Subhuti : As much as there is a sign, so much is there attachment.

analyzed: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o //

original: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te /
analyzed: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te /
translated: and all the wholesome roots of those disciples of the Tathāgatas and of other sentient beings, having made them into something with signs,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
translated: dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o //
translated: “Subhūti, to the extent that there is attention to something with signs, to that extent there is attachment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Those tathāgatas are not to be attended to as something with signs.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Those tathāgatas’ wholesome roots are not to be attended to as something with signs.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo //
translated: ” “Lord, the perfection of wisdom is deep.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because all phenomena are naturally void.

original: gsol pa / bcom 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: He said, “Blessed One, I pay homage to the perfection of wisdom!

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti, it is because the perfection of wisdom is uncreated

original: mngon par @265b 'du ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par @265b 'du ma byas pa ste /
translated: and unconditioned.

original: de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so //
translated: No one can realize it.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” He said, “Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: all phenomena are not realized.

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te /
translated: ” The Blessed One said, “Subhūti, it is because the nature of phenomena is not dual;

original: chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do //
translated: it is simply the nature of phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no; ;gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no; ;gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the nature of phenomena is not a nature, and what is not a nature is not created.

original: gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o //
translated: What is not created is unconditioned.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: when the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang rang bzhin ma yin pa /
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang rang bzhin ma yin pa /
translated: knows that the single nature of phenomena is not a nature,

original: ma byas pa /
analyzed: ma byas pa /
translated: not made,🔽and not compounded,

original: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no //
translated: he abandons all forms of attachment.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is difficult to understand.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong /
translated: “Subhūti, it is because the perfection of wisdom has not been seen,

original: ma rtogs / rnam par mi shes /
analyzed: ma rtogs / rnam par mi shes /
translated: not realized, and not fully understood by anyone.

original: mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because it has not been fully awakened to.”🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is inconceivable.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because the mind does not know it.”

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma shes so //🔽skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung @266a *//
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma shes so // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung @266a *//
translated: It is not known by form, feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: bas ma shes so //
analyzed: bas ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the sense bases, elements, or dependent origination.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the perfections, emptinesses, factors of awakening, noble truths, concentrations, immeasurables, or formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the eight liberations, nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, or wishlessness.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so //
translated: It is not known by the superknowledges, dhāraṇī gateways, or samādhis.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses of the tathāgatas, the detailed and thorough knowledges of the tathāgatas, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not know the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, and a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so //
translated: They do not know the knowledge of path aspects and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-five Thousand Lines,

original: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter XXVII, “The Purity of All Dharmas.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not something that is done.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / byed @266b pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byed @266b pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because the doer is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because form is not apprehended, and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not apprehended, up to it is because the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
translated: how should bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom practice?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: gal te gzugs la mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la mi spyod na /
translated: if they do not practice with form,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not practice feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not practice the sense fields, elements, or dependent origination,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang; byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang; byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not practice all the perfections, all the emptinesses, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, or the formless absorptions,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / @267a *//🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / @267a *// mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod na /
translated: and the clairvoyances,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: one is engaging in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not engage with the dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative stabilizations,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: one is engaging in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod na; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod na; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: If one does not engage with the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: gal te thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod na /
translated: one is engaging in the perfection of wisdom. If one does not engage with the knowledge of all aspects, the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all modes,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not practice ‘form is permanent’

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or ‘form is impermanent,’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not practice ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors,🔽and consciousness are permanent’

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are impermanent,’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not practice ‘up to the knowledge of all aspects is permanent’

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or ‘the knowledge of all aspects is impermanent,’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not practice ‘form is happiness’

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or ‘form is suffering,’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not practice ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are happiness’

original: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are suffering,’

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that there is suffering,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te rnam pa thams @267b cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice with the idea that from form up to the knowledge of all modes is happiness

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or suffering,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice with the idea that form is a self

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or not a self,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice with the idea that feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are a self

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or not a self,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one does not practice with the idea that from form up to the knowledge of all modes is a self

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: or not a self,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am /
translated: If one says, “Form is beautiful,”🔽

original: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that form is beautiful or ugly,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am; mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na /

translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: one practices the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / gang rtag pa'am /

analyzed: mi rtag pa'am /

analyzed: bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /

analyzed: bdag gam / bdag med pa'am /

analyzed: sdug pa'am / mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do // gang rtag pa'am /

original: mi rtag pa'am /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'am /

analyzed: bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /

analyzed: bdag gam / bdag med pa'am /

analyzed: sdug pa'am / mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / @268a *//

translated: There is no form that is permanent or impermanent,

original: bdag gam / bdag med pa'am /
analyzed: bdag gam / bdag med pa'am /

analyzed: sdug pa'am / mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med do ////
translated: There is no such aspect up to and including the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /🔽bam po bzhi bcu pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa / bam po bzhi bcu pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-five Thousand Lines

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: do not practice thinking, ‘Form is not complete,’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not engage in the notion that feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are incomplete,

original: shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

analyzed: gal te skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not engage in the notion that the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination are incomplete,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not engage in the notion that all the perfections and all the emptinesses are incomplete,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not engage in the notion that the applications of mindfulness are incomplete,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: then one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs @268b rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs @268b rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: “If they do not engage with the notion that the four correct exertions, the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are incomplete,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: then they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽“If they do not engage with the notion that the four noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and the clairvoyances are incomplete,🔽then they practice the perfection of wisdom.”🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are incomplete,🔽then they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: “If they do not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and the knowledge of all aspects are incomplete,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: then they practice the perfection of wisdom.”

original: gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not engage with the notion that the meditative stabilities and dhāraṇī gateways are incomplete,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are incomplete,🔽then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that omniscience is incomplete,🔽then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that the applications of mindfulness are incomplete,🔽then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are incomplete,🔽then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are incomplete,🔽then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not engage with the notion that omniscience is incomplete,🔽then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that the applications of mindfulness are incomplete,🔽then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are incomplete,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: then they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽If they do not engage with the notion that the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path are

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /🔽mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am /
translated: He has no notion of the noble truths, concentrations, immeasurables, formless absorptions, eight liberations, nine serial absorptions, emptiness,🔽signlessness, or wishlessness as being attached or unattached.

original: ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //

original: ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa'am /

analyzed: ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do // rang byang chub chags pa'am /

original: ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
analyzed: ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do //
