analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: and the higher knowledges are pure,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang; gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang; gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are pure,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are pure,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the purity of the knowledge of all modes,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽The Lord:

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: Subhuti:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom pure because of the purity of form?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs @282b su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs @282b su dag pa lags / ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom pure because of the purity of feeling, perception, the mental formations, and consciousness?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom pure because of the purity of the sense fields, elements, and the dependent origination?

original: ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven factors of awakening are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang; stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang; stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because all the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven aspects of awakening are pure?

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: and wishlessness, and the higher knowledges are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative stabilizations are pure?

original: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang; so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang; so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the powers of the Tathagata, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the attributes unique to a Buddha are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified because of the purification of the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four unhindered knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified because of the purification of the knowledge of all aspects up to the knowledge of path aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor / gzugs la skye ba med pa @283a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs la skye ba med pa @283a *//
translated: Subhūti, the nonproduction,

original: dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of form is the purification of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purification of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is that they are not produced and do not stop, are not defiled and are not purified.🔽The purification of the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination is that they are not produced and do not stop, are not defiled and are not purified.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni /
translated: The purification of all the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening is that they are not produced and do not stop, are not defiled and are not purified.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The thirty-seven factors of awakening are pure.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The four noble truths, the dhyānas, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the sequential meditative absorptions, emptiness,🔽signlessness, and wishlessness, and the superknowledges are pure.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes @283b pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes @283b pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of the superknowledges is the purity of the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
translated: The purity of the dhāraṇī gateways is the non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of the meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways.

original: rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas is the non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of the powers, fearlessnesses, detailed and thorough knowledges, and distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o; ;rab 'byor /🔽gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o; ;rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: up to and the knowledge of all aspects being non-production, non-stopping, not defiled, not undefiled, is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Moreover, Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is purified because space is purified.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: how is the perfection of wisdom purified because space is purified?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: “Because of non-production, non-stopping, not being defiled, and not being purified,

original: nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: space is purified.

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Subhūti, because there is no going in space,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: @284a *// gsol pa /
analyzed: @284a *// gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: why is the perfection of wisdom pure because there is no going in space?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor / nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is ungraspable.🔽Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is beyond conventions.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: why is the perfection of wisdom pure because space is beyond conventions?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: dper na / nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar /
translated: it is like the sound of an echo between two things.

original: nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because space is free of conceptual elaborations,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir /
translated: Subhūti, because space is inexpressible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: how is it that because space is inexpressible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do //
translated: “Subhūti, there is nothing at all that can be expressed in space.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, because space is inexpressible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan @284b yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan @284b yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: Subhūti, moreover, because space is unobservable,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that space is not apprehended?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is non-apprehensible?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do // rab 'byor / de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: “Subhūti, nothing is apprehended in space.🔽Subhūti, in the same way,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is non-apprehensible.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because all phenomena are non-arising, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One, how is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because all phenomena are non-arising, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: “Blessed One, how is the perfection of wisdom pure?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure because all phenomena are utterly pure.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du @285a *//🔽yid la bgyid na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du @285a *// yid la bgyid na /
translated: if any son or daughter of noble family were to hold, carry, read, and properly pay attention to this perfection of wisdom,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they would not develop any eye disease.

original: rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not develop any ear, nose, tongue, body, or limb disease.

original: lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not have an ugly body.

original: rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not have a body that is decrepit with old age.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That son of a good family or daughter of a good family will not die an untimely death, because they do not give up on what is unpleasant.

original: de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te /
translated: Many hundreds of thousands of gods will follow after them.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, up to the gods of the Śuddhāvāsa realm will follow after them.

original: gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang /
analyzed: gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang /
translated: Wherever that son of a good family or daughter of a good family who is a Dharma teacher teaches this perfection of wisdom,

original: tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: on the eighth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days, a great gathering of gods will gather.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe /
translated: When that son of a good family or daughter of a good family teaches this perfection of wisdom,

original: bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: they will increase their merit a great deal.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba /
translated: The mass of merit of that son of a good family or daughter of a good family is very great.

original: tshad ma mchis pa /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis pa /
translated: immeasurable,

original: grangs ma mchis pa /
analyzed: grangs ma mchis pa /
translated: incalculable,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: inconceivable,

original: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa; gzhal du ma mchis pa /
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa; gzhal du ma mchis pa /
translated: unequalled,

original: dpag tu ma mchis pa /
analyzed: dpag tu ma mchis pa /
translated: immeasurable,

original: rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will increase greatly.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rigs @285b kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te /
analyzed: rigs @285b kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te /
translated: The son or daughter of noble family who teaches this perfection of wisdom in the presence of the divine assembly on the eighth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days will have much merit.

original: bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa /
translated: That heap of merit will be immeasurable, incalculable, inconceivable, unequalled,

original: gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: immeasurable, and will increase greatly.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is a jewel.

original: rab 'byor / de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te /
translated: Subhūti, this is the jewel of the perfection of wisdom:

original: sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o //
translated: It liberates from the hells.

original: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o //
translated: It liberates from the animal world, the world of Yama, and from poverty among humans.

original: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o //
translated: It produces the high and noble class of the kṣatriyas.

original: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o //
translated: It produces the high and noble class of the brahmins.

original: khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o //
translated: It produces the high and noble class of the householders.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o //
translated: It produces the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o //
translated: It produces the gods of the Ābhāsvara realm up to the gods of the naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana realm.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o //
translated: It produces the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o //
translated: the fruit of arhatship,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o //
translated: and individual enlightenment.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o //
translated: It brings forth perfect enlightenment.🔽And why?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni @286a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni @286a *//
translated: Because,

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te /
translated: Śāriputra, in this perfection of wisdom the ten wholesome actions are revealed in detail,

original: de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: and through training in them the great and high families of the kṣatriyas exist,

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: the great and high families of the brahmins exist,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: the great and high families of the householders exist,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm exist,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the Trayas­triṃśa, Yāmā, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇa­rata, and Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realms exist,

original: tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang; tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang /
analyzed: tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang; tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang /
translated: Ābhāsvara, Śubha, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha,

original: dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: Śubhakṛtsna, Bṛhatphala, Avṛha, Atapa, Sudarśana, and Akaniṣṭha gods exist.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: Gods of the sphere of infinite space exist.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do; ;rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do; ;rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do //
translated: arhatship, individual enlightenment,

original: bla na med @286b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do //
analyzed: bla na med @286b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do //
translated: and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening exist.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na /
translated: If this perfection of wisdom exists,

original: bsam gtan bzhi yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yod do //
translated: the four concentrations exist,

original: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do //
translated: the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions exist;

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do //
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening exist;

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of giving exists;

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom exist.

original: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena exists.🔽The emptiness of external phenomena exists.🔽The emptiness of both external and internal phenomena exists.🔽The emptiness of emptiness exists.🔽The emptiness of great extent exists.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality exists.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena exists.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena exists.🔽The emptiness of the unlimited exists.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end exists.🔽The emptiness of non-dispersal exists.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence exists.🔽The emptiness of all things exists.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics exists.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension exists.🔽The emptiness of the absence of an apprehender exists.🔽The emptiness of the absence of both apprehended and apprehender exists.🔽The four noble truths exist.🔽The four concentrations exist.🔽The four immeasurables exist.🔽The four formless absorptions exist.🔽The eight aspects of liberation exist.🔽The nine serial steps of meditative absorption exist.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
translated: The three gates of liberation exist.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
translated: The five clairvoyances exist.🔽All the meditative stabilities exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do //
translated: All the dhāraṇī gateways exist.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha exist.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects exists.

original: de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: And it is like this: all those dharmas are revealed in detail in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de la @287a *//
analyzed: de la @287a *//
translated: In it

original: bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: the great and high-ranking kṣatriya clans exist.

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod do //
translated: The great and high-ranking brahmin clans exist.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: The great and high-ranking householders’ clans exist.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Cāturmahā­rājika gods exist.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang /🔽tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang /
translated: the gods of the Thirty-Three, the Yāma gods, the Tuṣita gods, the Nirmāṇarati gods, the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods, the Brahmakāyika gods, the Brahmapurohita gods, the Brahmapārṣadya gods, the Mahābrahma gods, the Ābhāsvara gods, the Parīttābha gods,🔽the Apramāṇābha gods, the Ābhāsvara gods, the Śubhakṛtsna gods, the Parīttaśubha gods, the Apramāṇaśubha gods, the Śubhakṛtsna gods, the Bṛhatphala gods,

original: mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Avṛha gods, the Atapa gods, the Sudarśana gods, and the Akaniṣṭha gods exist.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: and the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
translated: Those who have entered the stream exist.🔽Those who are tied to one more rebirth, those who are no longer subject to rebirth, arhats,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: and pratyekabuddhas exist.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do //
translated: Bodhisattvas exist.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: Tathāgatas, arhats, and samyaksaṃbuddhas exist.

original: de bas na de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che @287b zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che @287b zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the precious perfection.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am /
translated: In that precious perfection, no dharma is produced,🔽ceases,

original: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
analyzed: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
translated: is defiled,

original: rnam par byang ba'am /🔽yongs su gzung ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'am / yongs su gzung ba'am /
translated: is purified,🔽is appropriated,

original: dor ba med do //
analyzed: dor ba med do //
translated: or is rejected.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am /
translated: Because there is no such dharma that arises or ceases,

original: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /🔽rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba'am /
translated: is defiled or purified,

original: yongs su gzung ba'am /🔽dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do //🔽rab 'byor; pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am /🔽mi dge ba'am /
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba'am / dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do // rab 'byor; pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am /
translated: is taken up or laid down.

original: 'jig rten pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, in this precious perfection of wisdom no dharma at all is apprehended, whether wholesome or unwholesome,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /🔽zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am / zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: mundane or supramundane,

original: zag pa med pa'am /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'am /
translated: with outflows or without outflows,

original: 'dus byas sam /🔽'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas sam /🔽'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de /
translated: conditioned or unconditioned.
